subject-English: Digital channels and customer touchpoints have a specific and appropriate governance framework.
題目-Chinese: 公司對於數位通路與客戶接觸管道有具體且適當的管理架構。

subject-English: Policies always consider any relevant digital issues.
題目-Chinese: 公司政策將數位化議題納入考慮。

subject-English: Specific policies exist to address new digital issues e.g. the use of social media, bring your own device.
題目-Chinese: 公司具備解決新數位議題的規範 例：如何使用社群媒體。

subject-English: Implementation of organisational governance framework does not uilise digital communications methods.
題目-Chinese: 公司並未使用數位溝通方法來管理組織架構。

subject-English: There is no overarching digital steering group or equivalent.
題目-Chinese: 公司內部缺乏數位策劃小組或同等組織。

subject-English: Ownership of digital opportunities and risks within the Board is clear.
題目-Chinese: 公司董事會清楚掌握數位化的機會與風險。

subject-English: The Board is regularly and well briefed on digital issues affecting the organisation's market.
題目-Chinese: 董事會有定期了解影響其企業所在市場的數位議題。

subject-English: Where appropriate, individuals have KPIs designed to drive the exploitation of digital opportunities or mitigation of digital risks.
題目-Chinese: 公司必須針對數位機會的推動、風險的降低，設計員工的關鍵績效指標(KPI)。

subject-English: Investment decisions do not support the long term development of digital capabilities within the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 公司投資決策不支持組織內數位化能力的長遠發展。

subject-English: There is no comprehensive set of digital KPIs.
題目-Chinese: 公司缺乏一套完整的數位關鍵績效指標(KPI)。

subject-English: Measurement of digital channel data is timely.
題目-Chinese: 公司能即時衡量數位通路數據。

subject-English: Reporting of digital KPIs is substantially automated.
題目-Chinese: 公司能自動產出數位關鍵績效指標 (KPI)報告。

subject-English: The organisation makes use of self-learning systems.
題目-Chinese: 組織內部使用一套自主學習系統。

subject-English: Data-driven scenario planning is used by the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 組織利用資料導向的業務情境進行規劃。

subject-English: Key metrics and performance indicators are reported in real time.
題目-Chinese: 關鍵指標和績效指標能即時揭露。

subject-English: Digital dashboarding is used.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用數位化儀表板。

subject-English: KPI definitions are not clear.
題目-Chinese: 公司對關鍵績效指標（KPI）的定義不明確。

subject-English: There is regular debate over the accuracy of data in reports.
題目-Chinese: 公司針對報告數據的準確性經常有爭論。

subject-English: Change management is a recognised discipline within the organisation, with identifiable digital specialists.
題目-Chinese: 變革管理被認定為公司內部的教條並有數位專家參與其中。

subject-English: There is a dedicated digital change portfolio with its own budget.
題目-Chinese: 數位變革業務有其專屬預算。

subject-English: The realisation of expected benefits from digital change is not tracked post-implementation.
題目-Chinese: 數位變革預期利益在實施後不會進行追蹤。

subject-English: There is a digital change management training programme in place that is available to all relevant employees.
題目-Chinese: 公司已針對所有相關員工設計一套數位變革管理訓練。

subject-English: A continuous integration environment is available to support rapid implementation of bug fixes and other changes.
題目-Chinese: 公司內部是一個能迅速修正錯誤並因應其他變化的持續整合環境。

subject-English: Small changes can be effected directly by the business, subject to governance, but without requiring a full IT project.
題目-Chinese: 小型變革能直接由業務面進行並受監督，不需有完整的IT專案才能進行。

subject-English: IT and the business work effectively to deliver digital projects at speed.
題目-Chinese: IT和企業組織能有效且快速的執行並完成數位專案。

subject-English: Digital projects can be delivered in a variety of ways such as agile or waterfall depending on the needs of the project.
題目-Chinese: 數位專案可以各種方式進行，例如敏捷式或是瀑布式，取決於專案的需求。

subject-English: Mobile technology is widely available to employees across the business.
題目-Chinese: 公司員工廣泛的使用行動科技技術。

subject-English: Employees are able to work remotely where this is agreed.
題目-Chinese: 公司許可員工遠距工作。

subject-English: A wide range of self service functions are used by employees within the business.
題目-Chinese: 公司員工廣泛使用自助服務功能。

subject-English: The board fully understand the technological needs of employees.
題目-Chinese: 董事會充分了解員工使用科技的需求。

subject-English: Appropriate budget is in place for the procurement of worker mobility solutions.
題目-Chinese: 公司分配足夠的預算為員工的行動化方案進行採購。

subject-English: Remote access is available for employees.
題目-Chinese: 員工可使用遠端連線服務。

subject-English: Worker mobility enablement is a driver for the business.
題目-Chinese: 對企業來說，員工使用行動化載具程度是執行業務時的關鍵因子。

subject-English: Customer sales journeys are Straight-Through-Processed with no manual intervention required.
題目-Chinese: 客戶銷售為直通式處理直通式處理(Straight-Through-Processed，將日常工作交由電腦處理，減少人工)，無人工從中介入的需要。

subject-English: Customer queries and complaints are managed through a digital case management and workflow system.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用數位化方案與工作流程，加以管理客戶的諮詢及抱怨。

subject-English: Work that inherently requires human input is supported by relevant digital tools and enablers.
題目-Chinese: 使用適當的數位工具輔助原為人工投入的工作內容。

subject-English: Internal process (eg HR, Finance) are not online.
題目-Chinese: 內部流程 (如人力資源面、財務面等)尚未以線上方式(online)進行。

subject-English: Peripatetic staff are provided with mobile digital tools to support their work.
題目-Chinese: 提供外勤員工行動數位工具以支持其工作。

subject-English: Physical customer sales and service locations have direct access to digital processes such as order placement and management.
題目-Chinese: 實體客戶銷售和服務據點可運用數位化流程，如：預約安排和管理。

subject-English: Where a process is not STP, workarounds are in place so that it appears fully digitised to the customer.
題目-Chinese: 即便非制式的直通式處理(Straight-Through-Processed，將日常工作交由電腦處理，減少人工)，有妥善方式提供數位服務予客戶。

subject-English: Paper is largely used instead of digital image and workflow systems.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用紙本的比例仍大，而非使用數位呈現與工作流程系統。

subject-English: Records are principally maintained in paper form.
題目-Chinese: 公司的記錄主要以紙本型式進行儲存。

subject-English: Automated incident detection mechanisms are in place.
題目-Chinese: 自動偵測事件及應變機制已設立完善。

subject-English: Root cause analysis of incidents is not routinely undertaken.
題目-Chinese: 公司並未定期針對事件或意外的根本原因進行分析。

subject-English: Actions from investigations into incidents are always followed up.
題目-Chinese: 發生事件的調查行動總有被持續關注追蹤。

subject-English: Roles and responsibilities for incident response and resolution are not clear.
題目-Chinese: 針對事件應變及解決方案的角色和責任歸屬是劃分不明確的。

subject-English: The incident management framework is well established, with digital-specific components.
題目-Chinese: 事件應變管理機制已建置完善，並佐以數位方式處理。

subject-English: Some automated incident mitigations are in place.
題目-Chinese: 公司具備部分的事件應變自動化措施 。

subject-English: Co-ordination of incident management with other relevant organisations takes place.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有相關影響單位一起進行事件應變的管理方式。

subject-English: Aggregate and specific data on levels and types of incident is produced in a timely manner.
題目-Chinese: 能及時產出各種事件中的多面向數據 。

subject-English: No exercises are run to practise incident management responses.
題目-Chinese: 公司沒有針對事件應變管理進行訓練。

subject-English: Resilience is not built into the digital architecture and there are a number of single points of failure.
題目-Chinese: 數位架構不具有彈性且存有錯誤。

subject-English: There is a digital content management system in use for web and mobile channels.
題目-Chinese: 公司針對網站和行動通路設置數位內容管理系統。

subject-English: Content analytics are embedded throughout the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 整個組織使用數位內容分析。

subject-English: Content strategy is closely aligned to business strategy.
題目-Chinese: 數位內容策略與企業經營策略緊密連結。

subject-English: There is a content managment training programme in place.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有數位內容管理培訓計劃。

subject-English: There is a fundamental desire for employees to work within the content management function.
題目-Chinese: 員工對於與數位內容管理部門合作具有充分熱情。

subject-English: There is no content management calendar in place.
題目-Chinese: 公司沒有針對數位內容管理訂定時程規劃。

subject-English: All content is fully compliant to the same high level.
題目-Chinese: 所有的數位內容管理與所屬層級一致。

subject-English: All employees are aware of the risk policy associated with content management.
題目-Chinese: 所有的員工皆了解數位內容管理相關的風險政策。

subject-English: There is no budget assigned to the content management function.
題目-Chinese: 公司沒有分配預算給數位內容管理部門。

subject-English: There is no digital information architecture in place.
題目-Chinese: 公司缺乏適當的數位資訊架構。
